short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display the useful data on Amazon's product page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improving tools for day-to-day Amazon operations

New Features:
An eye-catching display of past sales
Display the most recent ratings for ASINs
Capability to download videos from amazon.com
Tracking the ranking of keywords on AMAZON US/DE/JP/FR/ES/IT/UK
